intro.accroche: Between lines of code and lines of ink, I craft interfaces that hit span hard. Inspired by tech, urban culture, and raw design, I blend front-end and UX/UI to create visual experiences that are minimal, bold, and uncompromising.
about.quote: «The web is more a social creation than a technical one. I designed it for a social effect, to help people work together and not as a technical toy»
